attributes.action: Stop providing benefits, housing etc to immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If an immigrant wishes to come into the our country they must have in place somewhere to live, and a job.  If they have any links to Countries with terrorist activities, they should be refused entry.  Instead we should spend the taxpayers money wasted on these immigrants to regenerating depressed areas and provide activities for the younger generation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
